name: Wreckless: The Yakuza Missions
overview: Ever been stuck in traffic and wanted to launch a missile up the exhaust pipe of the car in front? Or queued for the car park, wishing you could simply bash your way into any space you like? Then vent your vehicular frustrations with Wreckless: The Yakuza Missions. Boasting many more modes and missions than the hit Xbox version, Wreckless for Nintendo GameCube puts you in control of two teams of anti-terrorist agents tasked with cleaning up Hong Kong - by causing as much destruction as possible.
